PSCT.Base: Target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; send 1 card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon the targeted monster. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 of your FIRE monsters that are banished and/or in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Fire Recovery" once per turn.
